import React, {useState} from 'react' import "./header.css"; const Header = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const header = document.querySelector(".header"); //when the scroll is highter than 200 viewport height, add // the scroll-header class to a tag with the header tag if(this.scrollY >= 80) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }); /* ============ Toggle Menu ========== */ const[Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); const[activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState("#about"); return (
Karim
  • setActiveNav('#home')} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link "}> Home
  • About
  • Skills

  • Portfolio
  • Contact
showMenu(!Toggle)}>
showMenu (!Toggle)}>
) } export default Header
